item.description:
"Mass-AWIS: The PHARM Game: learn about the pharmaceutical
industry"

The PHARM Game:

Join the Massachusetts chapter of the Association for Women in
Science (AWIS) for a fun and interactive game to learn more
about the pharmaceutical industry. The PHARM GameÂ® is a
proven learning tool to teach novice and experienced industry
people about pharmaceutical drug discovery and development.
Open to men and women alike.

For more information on the game go to:
http://www.thelearnin...

Held at:
Novartis Institutes for BioMedical Research (NIBR)
220 Massachusetts Avenue, room 132, Cambridge, MA 02139 USA

Monday 1/24/11 6:00 to 9:00 p.m.

TO REGISTER AND FOR MORE INFORMATION, VISIT
http://www.acteva.com...

AWIS members and Students/Postdocs $10; $25 for non-members
Suggested date and time: Monday, January 24, 2011 6:00 PM
